subject: ref: new to junit on linux
msgSnippet: Hi Mike Im able to make junit tests work now .My java PATH variable and CLASSPATH wasnt set correctly.So I set it in my .profile file. Now its running fine Im
messageBody:
Hi Mike
Im able to make junit tests work now .My java PATH variable and CLASSPATH
wasnt set correctly.So I set it in my .profile file.

Now its running fine

Im using junit 3.8.2 just to start with..I need to upgrade to junit 4 .

thanks

Rs


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
